text:
Teen Mom’s Amber Portwood Reacts to Latest Cheating Allegations Surrounding Matt Baier

Amber Portwood can’t seem to catch a break from the tabloid headlines. On Monday night’s all-new Teen Mom: OG, viewers watched as the reality star coped with new reports that Matt…
